resources.string: Tell us about your consent right here. Just write and I\'ll respond.\nTry it!
Invite your friends on campus(@Profile page) to share in the experience! let\'s get there together
Here, you can find drivers going your direction and share the space in their vehicle. It won\'t cost you much, just enough to save everyone on cost.
We currently support MTN and Airtel Money
People you invite will recieve a code\nto create an account
Please wait at Commonwealth Hall for pickup\nYou\'ll be notified when the Driver set off at 5:30 PM
Did you know that having more than one image of yourself\nincreases trust? It also makes the drive locate you easily
Please proceed if you want to move your\naccount to a new handset
Share rides, drive comfortably and safetly together
It appears that this number is already\nregistered on Ghroupdrive
For security reasons, it is required that you\nare invited by someone you know or someone\nwho works at Ghroupdrive

array.name: walletarray
array.item: Buy vouchers at any Ghana Post Office
We currently support MTN and Airtel Money
Use your regular Bank issued ATM cards

array.name: details
array.item: Share rides, drive comfortably\nand safetly together
Share cost on every trip\nsaves you money
Meet and make friends with\nwonderful new people everyday
Grow your professional contact\nits just easier now
